SKT_FIRST.name: Just the Two of Us
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000018_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000018_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: The Apple of Your Eye
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The damage increases if the target has been inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000018_2_2]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000018_2_2] turn(s)</color>. The damage increases if the target has been inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Out of My Way
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nAfter attacking, reduces the target's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>. Has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nAfter attacking, reduces the target's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000018_3_2]</color>. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000018_3_1]</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000018_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000018_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000018_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000018_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000018_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
